sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_7a5c43ea1bb62d1070b43227dc4bcb4d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Checks for stops not assigned to the corrrect facilities stops table</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Check for Stops on the Parent Stop table</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_stops');
gr.addQuery('table','x_nuvo_eam_elocations');
gr.addQuery('sys_class_name','x_nuvo_eam_stops');
gr.query();

if(gr.next())
	util.handleOutput('One or more stops in the x_nuvo_eam_stops table are not linked correctly to the Facilities stops table. Please change the sys_class_name to coincide with the appropriate Facilities table','warning','Facilities Maintenance');]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pierson.arnold@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-17 14:15:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a5c43ea1bb62d1070b43227dc4bcb4d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check for Stops on the Parent Stop table</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_7a5c43ea1bb62d1070b43227dc4bcb4d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
